def find_array(arr1, arr2):
    return [ arr1[i] for i in arr2 if i< len(arr1) ]

def find_array(arr1, arr2):
    return [arr1[i] for i in arr2 if i <= len(arr1)]

def find_array(arr1, arr2):
    return [arr1[i] for i in range(len(arr1)) if i in arr2]

def find_array(arr1, arr2):
    return [arr1[x] for x in arr2 if x<= len(arr1)]

def find_array(xs, ys):
    return [xs[y] for y in ys if 0 <= y < len(xs)]

def find_array(arr1, arr2):
    return list() if (not arr1 or not arr2) else [arr1[i] for i in arr2 if i <= len(arr1)]

def find_array(arr1, arr2):
    return [] if len(arr1)*len(arr2)==0 else [arr1[i] for i in arr2 if i<len(arr1)]
